name: OAuth2PermissionGrant_Create
description: Grants OAuth2 permissions for the relevant resource Ids of an app.

body.description: The relevant app Service Principal Object Id and the Service Principal Object Id you want to grant.

$ul: **clientId**: The id of the resource's service principal granted consent to impersonate the user when accessing the resource (represented by the resourceId property).
**consentType**: Indicates if consent was provided by the administrator (on behalf of the organization) or by an individual.
**objectId**: The id of the permission grant
**principalId**: When consent type is Principal, this property specifies the id of the user that granted consent and applies only for that user.
**resourceId**: Object Id of the resource you want to grant
**scope**: Specifies the value of the scope claim that the resource application should expect in the OAuth 2.0 access token. For example, User.Read
